<title level="1" right="Rules">[Trait](/Rules.aspx?ID=43)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 13 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A trait is a keyword that conveys additional information about a rules element, such as a school of magic or rarity. Often, a trait indicates how other rules interact with an ability, creature, item, or another rules element that has that trait. All the traits used in this book are listed [here](/traits).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
